price: 9. Mise, ma waxaad mooddaa in (dhacdadii) qolodii hogga iyo looxa (ay ku qornaayeen magacayadoodu)3 ay yihiin ku- wa calaamooyinkayaga ugu yaabka badan4?
arabic: أَمۡ حَسِبۡتَ أَنَّ أَصۡحَٰبَ ٱلۡكَهۡفِ وَٱلرَّقِيمِ كَانُواْ مِنۡ ءَايَٰتِنَا عَجَبًا
footnotes:
3. Ar-Raqiim: waa looxii ama indhalkii ay ku qornaayeen xikmadaha iyo wararkii asxaabul kahaf. Waana mid ka mid ah waxyaalaha cajabta badan ee Allaah abuuray. 
4. Bal waa mid keliya ka mid ah waxyaalaha cajaa’ibta badan ee Alle.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: am ḥasib'ta anna aṣḥāba al-kahfi wal-raqīmi kānū min āyātinā ʿajaban
